channel.title: Server is already in use? (im using utorrent)
channel.description:
okay so im using utorrent, and i have a source and a client and all that and i didnt feel like doing portforwarding because i already had utorrent. So whenever i open up my run.bat it just says server is already in use...Any suggestions?
also. i made a server with my friend before and well i remember going to the gui and changing the i.p would i still have to do all that with utorrent? because i dont know if that's that same.

item.title: Server is already in use? (im using utorrent)
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

thanks i vain i, but now it says error connecting to server. do i have to change up the i.p’s? and if so how do i find them? because like i’ve said im not used to utorrent

Read full topic
